name: Cerdia International GmbH
goal: Rhodia Acetow is an innovative company head quartered in Freiburg Germany with plants also in France and in other countries out of EU. Rhodia Acetow is specialised in the production of Cellulose Acetate, a bio-based polymer that is used in different applications like Fibres, Films or plastic compounds.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Commission proposal for Single Use Plastic. Follow up of trilogue discussions and negotiations
